cause.description:
Urgent Action Alert - Please help! Guatemalan women trapped in sweatshop sewing Daisy Fuentes clothing seek help from the TV host and model.
Read the Fribo report on the NLC website: http://www.nlcnet.org/article.php?id=344
Write a letter to Daisy Fuentes on behalf of the workers sewing her clothing label.... http://www.nlcnet.org/article.php?id=351
Thanks for your help on this. We will keep you posted on any developments.
1. Workers should be treated with respect
cause.mission: Help workers at the Fribo factory in Guatemala
cause.name: Urgent Alert: Help Guatemalan workers sewing for Daisy Fuentes
